thread.section_title: Excelsior Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Go Elsewhere
thread.title_full: Go Elsewhere - Review of Excelsior Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DGershuny
title: Go Elsewhere
text:
The front desk staff was rude and the accommodations were sub-par. In addition to dangerous electrical problems in the room, the toilet made a high-pitched squeal each time we flushed, the shower drained very slowly. Plus there is no parking at the hotel. Not worth the money.
Room Tip: Find another hotel. See more room tips
